title: How do YouTubers get so much content? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because of their passion to create videos and entertain the people. The most important thing to be successful in YouTube is to create videos in a niche in which you have a passion. Otherwise, very soon you will feel bored and disheartened and stop making the videos. YouTubers work hard, very hard for their content. It’s almost like an everyday job. They have to think day in and day out for content and that too good content. You cannot be a YouTuber if you don’t have patience and ideas.
